timeline.bodyText: Instead of passing another parameter to this method. Shall we add a new setter method in Method.Builder class like setMethodDescriptor.

timeline.bodyText:
Shall we keep the method name as setMessageList here?
Since we are setting a message list, I feel the previous name more suits.
